sentences.en: After playing a little on the harpsichord, he asked for a theme.
sentences.cn: 贝多芬在大键琴上演奏了一会儿后, 向莫扎特要了个主旋律.
古钢琴音乐可以随时演奏.

sentences.en: I can tune the harpsichord as well as play it.
sentences.cn: 我会弹奏大键琴,同样地,我也会给大键琴调音.

sentences.en: One piece was the harpsichord part for the Concerto in G (molto allegro) and the other was the Prelude in G major.
sentences.cn: 一件是G大调协奏曲的大提琴部分，另外一件是G大调协奏曲的序曲。

sentences.en: The larger zither family includes such instruments as the Aeolian harp, autoharp, cimbalom, dulcimer, koto, and even the clavichord, harpsichord, and piano.
sentences.cn: 齐特族乐器品种不一，包括如风鸣琴、自动竖琴、小提琴、扬琴、日本古琴，以及击弦键琴、大键琴和钢琴。

sentences.en: the plangent sound of the harpsichord
sentences.cn: 拨弦键琴如泣如诉的声音

sentences.en: There are also 19 harpsichord suites and several variation sets.
sentences.cn: 还有19间套房和大键琴套几个变化。

trans.tran_cn: 有键竖琴，羽管键琴，大键琴
trans.tran_en: a musical instrument like a piano, used especially in the past
